TopicTitle: Can we clean up the space display?

Articles.Content:
I have been launching a lot of rockets both into orbit and to the mun (And a few to the sun) and over time the space map has become cluttered with loads and loads of discarded booster stages. While I do not mind having said stages kept track of by the game. (Going into a 100km orbit in the wrong direction could be VERY bad ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) and I like it that way)

I do wish I could get everything without a command capsule removed from the display to make it easier to see what I have going on. Is there any way to do this? And if not is it on the road map for future versions?

[http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=9951.1275](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=9951.1275)

one of the listed fixes that Harvester posted today fixes exactly this.

It sounds like you want a way to 'filter' debris out of the map view. We don\'t have that yet, as far as I know.

If you want to actually remove the debris from the game, there are some options:

1) use the game settings to reduce persistent debris to 25 objects,

2) edit the persistent.sfs file according to [this thread](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=8814.0),

3) blow it out of the sky, using [Tosh\'s Sunbeam Laser](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=6452.msg86638#msg86638) mod,

4) reduce future sky pollution by launching things according to d[ebris mitigation protocols](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10580.0).

Correct I am looking to filter the debris, I like having the danger of slamming into last weeks spent stage at staggering speeds ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

If I can I would like to keep as many debris as I can, the more the better. Let\'s face it the odds of a collision are really low until the volume of objects gets very high, but I still would like to be able to see where all my ships are without them getting lost in the display of all the spent stages.

I will just go back to waiting for a change that lets us filter them out ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
